markdown: The Coca-Cola Company # Our Commitments To help develop workable solutions to address obesity, we have made the following commitments: <::transcription of the content : cycle diagram::> Use Evidence-Based Science Innovate - Sweeteners - Products - Packaging - Equipment - Marketing Execute & Educate around Choice - Coca-Cola TM - Total Beverage Portfolio Inform With Transparency Market Responsibly Promote Active, Healthy Living - Associates - Communities ::> * **Use Evidence-Based Science:** We are committed to using evidence-based science to guide the choices we offer and the way we educate about those choices; * **Innovate:** We are committed to investing in the innovation of sweeteners, products, packaging, equipment and marketing that fosters active, healthy living; * **Execute & Educate Around Choice:** We are committed to bringing real choice to consumers everywhere, and educating them on the role our variety of beverages can play in sensible, balanced diets and active, healthy lifestyles; * **Inform With Transparency:** We are committed to being transparent about the nutritional content of our products; * **Market Responsibly:** We are committed to responsible marketing of our products, honoring the rights of parents and caregivers, and informing and educating consumers about the beverages we provide; and * **Promote Active, Healthy Living:** We are committed to being part of workable solutions to the problems facing society related to obesity by assisting our associates and their families, as well as the communities that we serve, in promoting active, healthy living. November 2012 Page | 3 Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/jxpj0226
